name: Gem Deeps
description:
Gem Deeps is an action-adventure platforming RPG with skill-based combat,
hand-painted art, and a deep story.

While chasing a stolen magic crystal, you are stumbling upon an ancient underworld civilization and scripts of even older origin.
Both of those sources, the underworld mythos, and ancient tablets, are offering ​different versions of the long-forgotten Genesis story.

Fight Packs Of Enemies


Precision in combat is crucial - every enemy has a weak spot.

Level Up Your Abilities


Depending on your choices in the skill tree, you could rule over almost every type of enemy.

Collect Underground Lore


Listening to various characters may help you uncover useful secrets like info on the local boss.
